page.title: 03PRINCIPAL FEATURES - THREE
page.content: In this rural area within the parish of {Middle Rasen}the main industries are{agriculture}and{forestry.}Along the A46 is a{market garden,}private{ {fishing club,}and{boarding kennels}for cats and dogs. Beside the A1103 is a{ {transport cafe}and a{breeding kennels} for dogs. On the minor road to Walesby there is a manned{railway level {crossing.}The gates are operated manually. {Wild life}has been depleted by hedgerow destruction but farmers are now far more conscious of{ {conservation.}Therefore pockets of woodland are being developed or saved for wildlife to flourish. The area is represented by the{ {Liberal-SDP Alliance}on the East Lindsey District Council and by the{ {Conservatives}on the County Council and at Westminster.
